ext.config.dataConnect.alwaysAllowMutati: Always allow mutations in production. If false (default), trying to run a mutation in production will open a confirmation modal.
ext.config.dataConnect.skipToAppFolderSe: Skip app folder selection prompt. If false (default), trying to generate SDK config will open a confirmation modal.
ext.config.debug: Enable writing debug-level messages to the file provided in `#firebase.debugLogPath#` (requires restart)
ext.config.debugLogPath: If `#firebase.debug#` is `true`, Append debug-level messages to the provided file (requires restart)
ext.config.npmPath: Path to NPM executable in local environment
ext.config.title: Prettier
ext.config.idx.viewMetricNotice: Show data collection notice on next startup (IDX Only)
